action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: I will start with a common five-letter word that includes a variety of vowels and consonants to gather initial feedback.
guess: crane

attempts = 1
target_word = squat
guess = crane
guess_feedback = c<red> r<red> a<yellow> n<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: c<red> r<red> a<yellow> n<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "a" is in the word but in the wrong position. I will choose a new word that includes "a" in a different position and excludes the letters "c", "r", "n", and "e".
guess: salty

attempts = 2
target_word = squat
guess = salty
guess_feedback = s<green> a<yellow> l<red> t<yellow> y<red>

guess_feedback: s<green> a<yellow> l<red> t<yellow> y<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "s" is correct and in the right position. "a" and "t" are in the word but in the wrong positions. Excluding "l" and "y", I will choose a word that includes "s" in the first position, "a" and "t" in different positions, and avoids "l" and "y".
guess: staid

attempts = 3
target_word = squat
guess = staid
guess_feedback = s<green> t<yellow> a<yellow> i<red> d<red>

guess_feedback: s<green> t<yellow> a<yellow> i<red> d<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "s" is correct and in the right position. "t" and "a" are in the word but in the wrong positions. Excluding "i" and "d", I will choose a word that includes "s" in the first position, "t" and "a" in different positions, and avoids "i" and "d".
guess: stash

attempts = 4
target_word = squat
guess = stash
guess_feedback = s<green> t<yellow> a<yellow> s<red> h<red>

guess_feedback: s<green> t<yellow> a<yellow> s<red> h<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "s" is correct and in the first position. "t" and "a" are in the word but in the wrong positions. Excluding the second "s" and "h", I will choose a word that includes "s" in the first position, "t" and "a" in different positions, and avoids "s" and "h".
guess: satin

attempts = 5
target_word = squat
guess = satin
guess_feedback = s<green> a<yellow> t<yellow> i<red> n<red>

guess_feedback: s<green> a<yellow> t<yellow> i<red> n<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "s" is correct and in the first position. "a" and "t" are in the word but in the wrong positions. Excluding "i" and "n", I will choose a word that includes "s" in the first position, "a" and "t" in different positions, and avoids "i" and "n".
guess: stoat

attempts = 6
target_word = squat
guess = stoat
guess_feedback = s<green> t<red> o<red> a<green> t<green>

guess_explanation: I will start with a common five-letter word that includes a variety of vowels and consonants to gather initial feedback.
The letter "a" is in the word but in the wrong position. I will choose a new word that includes "a" in a different position and excludes the letters "c", "r", "n", and "e".

The letter "s" is correct and in the right position. "a" and "t" are in the word but in the wrong positions. Excluding "l" and "y", I will choose a word that includes "s" in the first position, "a" and "t" in different positions, and avoids "l" and "y".

The letter "s" is correct and in the right position. "t" and "a" are in the word but in the wrong positions. Excluding "i" and "d", I will choose a word that includes "s" in the first position, "t" and "a" in different positions, and avoids "i" and "d".

The letter "s" is correct and in the first position. "t" and "a" are in the word but in the wrong positions. Excluding the second "s" and "h", I will choose a word that includes "s" in the first position, "t" and "a" in different positions, and avoids "s" and "h".

The letter "s" is correct and in the first position. "a" and "t" are in the word but in the wrong positions. Excluding "i" and "n", I will choose a word that includes "s" in the first position, "a" and "t" in different positions, and avoids "i" and "n".
